reviewText: Star rating for DVD itself, not movie. The movie is a classic, this disc is a mess. My VHS copy looks better than this DVD. It is not...I repeat NOT Korean language with English subs. it's the same bad dub as the VHS copies. Was not worth the 10 bucks I spent on a used copy, no way it's worth 300 plus for a new one. save your cash watch it on Youtube for free.
